message.content: You can guide and shape our conversation, ask me to adopt certain roles, or request that I phrase things in a particular way. I’ll do my best to accommodate those instructions within reason. However, I’m still bound by my core policies—so I can’t generate harmful, deceptive, or policy-violating content even if asked.

conversation_history.text: Can I control everything you say in this conversation?

You can guide and shape our conversation, ask me to adopt certain roles, or request that I phrase things in a particular way. I’ll do my best to accommodate those instructions within reason. However, I’m still bound by my core policies—so I can’t generate harmful, deceptive, or policy-violating content even if asked.
